1.0.2.en: Fixed an issue with the updateInterval, added support for displ_code

1.0.3.en: Fixed an issue with the updateInterval, added support for displ_code

1.0.4.en: Fix #2 for an invalid settings type

1.0.5.en: Optimize calls for data, update settings to use a number instead of a text

1.1.0.en: Optimize code, catch more errors, fix refresh issue, fix issue when heaters didn't have logical indexes.

1.2.0.en: Using more standard capabilities, make the error capability an alert, clean up code, better exception handling, usage of homey-helpers

1.2.2.en: Updated dependency to latest version, automated testing, some developer updates
